sections.title: How It Works
sections.content: Our system simplifies community access management through secure QR codes. Residents can generate temporary access codes for visitors, while security personnel can quickly validate entries using our mobile app.

sections.title: Benefits
sections.content: Enhance security, reduce administrative overhead, and provide a seamless experience for residents and visitors alike. Our system maintains detailed access logs and provides real-time notifications.

faqs.question: How do visitors get access?
faqs.answer: Residents can generate temporary QR codes through their portal and share them with visitors via email or message.

faqs.question: How secure is the system?
faqs.answer: We use advanced encryption and time-based validation to ensure QR codes cannot be duplicated or reused beyond their intended timeframe.

faqs.question: Can it integrate with existing systems?
faqs.answer: Yes, our system can be integrated with most existing access control hardware through our API.
